item.title: Tracker(gps tracking platform)
item.comment:
Tracker was a full feature tracking platform with support
         for almost all of popular tracking devices like:
            Coban models
            Teltonika 
            and other hardwares
        but i also wrote a middleware specially for our hardware team customized device.
       i write this project with angular and google maps but later had to rewrite it with React and OpenStreetMap because of Google sanctions on Iran
